body.p:
Brooksville Ky May 23- 1864
Hon Thomas. E. Bramlitte
Dear sir-

We Enclose you a petition in favor of the undersigned which we hope you will grant us. And discharge us from the fine. of which we are -- convicted as stated in the petition Sent you. By remitting the fine you will greatly favor us. and do Justice as we humbly believe to the Commonwealth of Kentucky and the petitioners. Your immediate attention to this request is desired

Respectfully.
John Hays
Dennis Hays
Thomas McCann
